description: Suddenly ripping off a string of clothespins pinched to the skin delivers one of the most intense sensations masochists crave. The experience has often been referred to as a "pain-gasm." Definitely not for the timid (whether Top of bottom), zippers can be a powerful element in your S/m skill set. With Bella Rossi as her model, Flaming June demonstrates how to create, play with, and execute a zipper, using nothing more than common clothespins and string. You'll also see what a surprisingly sensual experience zippers can be, progressively building the sensation and pain bit by bit with the application of each individual clothespin.
title: Clothespin Zippers: with Flaming June and Bella Rossi
